snippet.title: The Outbound Ghost Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: The Outbound Ghost is an adventure game set in a haunted village. You play as a ghost figuring out the cause of their own death while helping others come to terms with the afterlife. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1276810
